ValidationRule.description: Requires that the Assigned Lead Owner ID
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Set_Lead_Owner__c = True, OR( ISBLANK(Assigned_Lead_Owner_ID__c), LEN(Assigned_Lead_Owner_ID__c) <> 15 ), LEFT(Assigned_Lead_Owner_ID__c ,3) <> "00G", LEFT(Assigned_Lead_Owner_ID__c ,3) <> "005" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a proper Assigned Lead Owner ID. You can find this by going to the Users record and take the last 15 digits of that pages URL.
